long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple Coin Price Tracker gives you quick updates on cryptocurrency prices. It refreshes the selected coin's price every 15 seconds, so you always have the latest info.

The data shown at this extension is provided by the Binance API.

Features:

✅  Dynamic Price Updates (every 15sec)
✅  Icon-Based Display
✅  Low Resource Consumption
✅  Secure and Permission-Free: Operates securely without needing any extra browser permissions.
